class_notes: (ON CAMPUS) (This course is an interdisciplinary exploration of the intersection of spirituality and health whereby one is invited to contemplate and define health and spirituality from one's own context and ways of being. The class will also examine the praxis of spirituality  and will serve as an entry point to the in depth study of religions through the lens of salvation as wholeness and health.)
course_description: This course is an interdisciplinary exploration of the intersection of spirituality and health whereby one is invited to contemplate and define health and spirituality from one's own context and ways of being. The class will also examine the praxis of spirituality and will serve as an entry point to the in depth study of religions through the lens of salvation as wholeness and health.
schedule_location: M 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_401
